text: TwoLittleBread@Eco Botanic, the waffles are crispy outside and soft inside, with a great balance of texture. The portion is just right, and the flavors are well-balanced. A cozy spot for a relaxing tea break. The cafÃ© has a nice ambiance, making it a great place to unwind. Their drinks complement the waffles well, and the service is friendly. Worth a visit for a light and satisfying treat!

food is good but a bit pricey .

I requested one slice of tomato, they initially wanted to add rm1.50 without telling me and I only noticed this while making payment. However after communication , they waived off.

Then subsequently we added spam fries for snack. When food comes we all stunned . How come it charge us rm 17.90 for 9 spam fries ? We all look at the spam fries all ???

Overall the food and environment are good we will definitely be back for sandwiches and not for their spam fries ðŸ˜…
Ambient design, light touch of cooling colors for a nice environment, food is reasonably priced and great taste as well. Nice breakfast!

This place reminds me of another that used to be in the same area but abruptly closed. My son loves the sandwiches and waffles there. Well we have found another go to place for waffles and sandwiches. Abit of a pity they charge for filtered water though.. this unwelcome trend seems to be picking up.
Good atmosphere, good food. However price will be at slightly high side.
